languages.text: "Несомненно, Ваша Светлость". {n}Клеменциа принимает ваши слова с ледяным спокойствием.{/n} "Сегодня же с уходом солнца я предамся самобичеванию в семейной молельне Версерианов. Сто ударов плетью — если того будет недостаточно, добавлю еще пять десятков".

traits.locale_text: "Несомненно, Ваша Светлость". {n}Клеменциа принимает ваши слова с ледяным спокойствием.{/n} "Сегодня же с уходом солнца я предамся самобичеванию в семейной молельне Версерианов. Сто ударов плетью — если того будет недостаточно, добавлю еще пять десятков".

languages.text: "Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."
languages.original_text: "Несомненно, Ваша Светлость". {n}Клеменциа принимает ваши слова с ледяным спокойствием.{/n} "Сегодня же с уходом солнца я предамся самобичеванию в семейной молельне Версерианов. Сто ударов плетью — если того будет недостаточно, добавлю еще пять десятков".

traits.locale_text: "Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."

"Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."

"Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."

"Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."

"Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."

"Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."

languages.text: « Sans nul doute, Votre Seigneurie. »{n}Clémentia accepte vos paroles avec un calme glacial.{/n} « Dès ce soir, je m'administrerai cent coups de fouet en la chapelle de la famille Werserian et, si cela ne suffit pas, j'en ajouterai cinq douzaines de plus. »
languages.original_text: "Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."

traits.locale_text: « Sans nul doute, Votre Seigneurie. »{n}Clémentia accepte vos paroles avec un calme glacial.{/n} « Dès ce soir, je m'administrerai cent coups de fouet en la chapelle de la famille Werserian et, si cela ne suffit pas, j'en ajouterai cinq douzaines de plus. »

languages.text: “当然，大人。”{n}克莱门缇雅冷静地接受了你的提议。{/n}“等今天工作结束，我会在韦尔森家族的礼拜堂里自我鞭笞，鞭打一百下。如果这还不够，我会再加五十下。”
languages.original_text: "Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."

traits.locale_text: “当然，大人。”{n}克莱门缇雅冷静地接受了你的提议。{/n}“等今天工作结束，我会在韦尔森家族的礼拜堂里自我鞭笞，鞭打一百下。如果这还不够，我会再加五十下。”

languages.text: "Zweifellos, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Clementia akzeptiert deine Worte mit eiskalter Ruhe.{/n} "Ich werde mich am Ende des Tages in der Familienkapelle der Werserians einer Selbstgeißelung unterziehen. Einhundert Hiebe — und sollte das nicht ausreichen, füge ich fünf Dutzend weitere hinzu."
languages.original_text: "Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."

traits.locale_text: "Zweifellos, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Clementia akzeptiert deine Worte mit eiskalter Ruhe.{/n} "Ich werde mich am Ende des Tages in der Familienkapelle der Werserians einer Selbstgeißelung unterziehen. Einhundert Hiebe — und sollte das nicht ausreichen, füge ich fünf Dutzend weitere hinzu."

languages.text: «Desde luego, {mf|milord|milady}». {n}Clementia acepta tus palabras con una absoluta tranquilidad.{/n} «Al terminar el día, me someteré a la autoflagelación en la capilla de la familia Werserian. Cien latigazos, y si eso no es suficiente, añadiré cinco docenas más».
languages.original_text: "Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego, {mf|milord|milady}». {n}Clementia acepta tus palabras con una absoluta tranquilidad.{/n} «Al terminar el día, me someteré a la autoflagelación en la capilla de la familia Werserian. Cien latigazos, y si eso no es suficiente, añadiré cinco docenas más».

languages.text: 「申し分ありません、{mf|陛下|陛下}」{n}クレメンティアは氷のような冷静さであなたの言葉を受け入れた。{/n}「今日が終われば、私はウェルザリアン家の礼拝堂で自己処罰の鞭打ちを行います。百回の鞭打ち。そして、それが十分でなければ、さらに60回追加しましょう」
languages.original_text: "Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."

traits.locale_text: 「申し分ありません、{mf|陛下|陛下}」{n}クレメンティアは氷のような冷静さであなたの言葉を受け入れた。{/n}「今日が終われば、私はウェルザリアン家の礼拝堂で自己処罰の鞭打ちを行います。百回の鞭打ち。そして、それが十分でなければ、さらに60回追加しましょう」

languages.text: "Muhakkak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Clementia, söylediklerini duygusuz bir soğukkanlılıkla karşılıyor.{/n} "Gün sonunda, Werserian aile şapelinde kendi kendime kırbaçlama cezası vereceğim. Yüz kırbaç... Eğer bu da yetmezse altmış daha ekleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Unquestionably, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia accepts your words with ice-cold calmness.{/n} "At day's end, I will submit myself to self-flagellation at the Werserian family chapel. A hundred lashes — and if that won't be sufficient, I will add five dozen more."

traits.locale_text: "Muhakkak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Clementia, söylediklerini duygusuz bir soğukkanlılıkla karşılıyor.{/n} "Gün bitince, Werserian aile şapelinde kendi kendime kırbaçlama cezası vereceğim. Yüz kırbaç... Eğer bu da yetmezse, beş düzine daha ekleyeceğim."
